summary: This bill, the NRC Office of Public Engagement and Participation Act of 2025, establishes an Office of Public Engagement and Participation within the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC). The office will support public participation in NRC proceedings, advocate for the public interest, and provide guidance and assistance to the public. It also grants the NRC the authority to provide compensation for participation in certain proceedings. The bill mandates an annual report to Congress on the office's activities and aims to ensure the office's independence.
